hypothesis_content.title: Gas-to-Volume Divergence Signaling Exhaustion
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum's gas price increases >50% week-over-week while ETH trading volume decreases >20% week-over-week during any regime except STRESS, a reversal of the current ETH trend will occur within 3-5 days with 75% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Rising gas with falling volume suggests speculative froth without sustainable demand—likely wash trading or inefficient arbitrage. This divergence typically resolves with price moving toward volume's direction (down if volume declining).
entry_conditions: ETH weekly avg gas price increase >50% WoW
Not in STRESS regime (VIX < 35, BTC 24h vol < 80%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH price reverses 5% against prior trend
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volume recovers to match gas increase (failed divergence)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price continues trending with divergence for >7 days, indicating new paradigm where gas spikes don't correlate with retail activity.
